name: Ext_R5_AdverseEvent_su_ca_entityRelatedness
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality.entityRelatedness for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality.entityRelatedness from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/AdverseEvent|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Result of the assessment regarding the relatedness of the suspected entity to the event
element.definition: The result of the assessment regarding the relatedness of the suspected entity to the event.
element.comment: `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality.entityRelatedness` maps to R4B `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality.productRelatedness`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Result of the assessment regarding the relatedness of the suspected entity to the event
element.definition: The result of the assessment regarding the relatedness of the suspected entity to the event.
element.comment: `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality.entityRelatedness` maps to R4B `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality.productRelatedness`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Codes for the assessment of whether the entity caused the event.
